title: Smart Data Models - ExcDC3A1
description: Adapted from CIM data models. This is modified old IEEE type 3 excitation system.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcDC3A1

exclim.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. (exclim). true = lower limit of zero is applied to integrator output false = lower limit of zero not applied to integrator output. Typical Value = true. Default: False

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 300. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter constant related to self-excited field (Ke).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer gain (Kf).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Potential circuit gain coefficient (Ki).  Typical Value = 4.83. Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Potential circuit gain coefficient (Kp).  Typical Value = 4.37. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (Te).  Typical Value = 1.83. Default: 0

tf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 0.675. Default: 0

vb1max.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Available exciter voltage limiter (Vb1max).  Typical Value = 11.63. Default: 0.0

vblim.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Vb limiter indicator. true = exciter Vbmax limiter is active false = Vb1max is active.  Typical Value = true. Default: False

vbmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Available exciter voltage limiter (Vbmax).  Typical Value = 11.63. Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0
